content:
Drew Camron said:

Per John's discussion, do we want to consider some sort of AMS abstract (due Wed Sep 1)?

forwarding to new stream for dedicated discussion
I am planning on submitting an abstract on ESDS + diagnostics stuff, which I will likely mention Pythia
alright; I want to put _something_ together for AMS, just not sure what yet. Might tie this in or focus on this somehow
